snippet: Mr. Hamm, who became frustrated with the condescension of his fellow musicologists toward popular music, wrote two books that have become standard texts.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Hamm, who became frustrated with the condescension of his fellow musicologists toward popular music, wrote two books that have become standard texts.

headline.main: Charles Hamm, Author on American Popular Music, Dies at 86
headline.print_headline: Charles Hamm, Author on American Popular Music, Dies at 86
headline.seo: Charles Hamm, Author on American Popular Music, Dies at 86
